data.name: Fel Orc
data.description:
The Chaos - Fel Orc [E]
Units:
+10% attack rate

Buildings:
+100 attack range

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Magic:
Cripple (Reduces unit's damage by 25%)
Searing Flame (Reduces unit's armor by 6)
Fel Boulders (Deals 150 damage in 200 AoE)

Traits: Its more about making your enemies weaker than increasing your own strength. Lots of debilitating effects susceptible to buff dispels. Overfocused on offence and thus lacking in defence.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Vampiric Aura
auras.description:
20% melee lifesteal
(2500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Abyssal Guards
auras.description:
Give all Heroes Infernal summon ability

Unique Aura

bonuses.name: Archimonde's Right Hand [Q]
bonuses.description:
Mannoroth replaces Xerox

Special Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Ground Slam (Damage Spell)
250-400 damage, 3-9s stun
(300-600 area of effect)
Cleaving Attack (Passive Skill)
10-16% area damage
Corruption Aura (Disable Aura)
4-10 armor reduction
Rain of Chaos (Summoning Spell)
summons 3 Infernals for 60-90s

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Big Game Hunters [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Rapidshot
+1 level of Burning Arrows

Fel Orc Spearthrower replaces Crossbowman
Ranged Unit
+20% attack rate
+12 damage
+75 HP

(400 damage to Air unit)

(15% to deal 2.5x damage)

Chaos Armor
Burning Arrows
Demon Blood
Rapidshot

+1 level of Demon Blood

Icreases Keep and Warlock mana by 10%. Unlocks more upgrades inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Keep spells by 30%.

bonuses.description:
Your units have a 5/10/15/25% chance of being reborn into Void after death.
(affects organic units only)

Type: Unit Power / Unique Bonus

upgrades.name: Desecration
upgrades.description:
Gives:
Increases chance to 5%, Slasher, Raider and Crossbowman have chanse of being reborn into Voidwraith after death

spells.name: Intimidation Aura
spells.description: Reduces nearby enemy unit's attack rate by 20%.

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

Hero Unit (Ranged)

disorientates units for 2-4 sec

150-450 damage in area
(45 second cooldown)

Rain of Chaos (Summoning Spell)

Type: Hero Power

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Blades
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: reduces target's armor
Affects: Slasher
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: -3 armor for 4 seconds
Lv2: -6 armor for 6 seconds
Lv3: -9 armor for 8 seconds
Lv4: -12 armor for 10 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Demon Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: health regeneration and attack rate
Affects: All non-Hero units

Lv1: +1 HP/sec regeneration, +3% attack rate
Lv2: +2 HP/sec regeneration, +6% attack rate
Lv3: +3 HP/sec regeneration, +9% attack rate
Lv4: +4 HP/sec regeneration, +12% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Burning Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Crossbowman
(affects buildings only)

Lv1: 10 damage/sec for 10 seconds
Lv2: 20 damage/sec for 12 seconds
Lv3: 30 damage/sec for 14 seconds
Lv4: 40 damage/sec for 16 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Rapidshot
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: faster attack for more dmg taken
Affects: Crossbowman

Lv1: +20% attack rate, +10% damage taken
Lv2: +40% attack rate, +20% damage taken
Lv3: +60% attack rate, +30% damage taken
Lv4: +80% attack rate, +40% damage taken

spells.name: Rapidshot
spells.description: Causes this unit to attack 20% faster, but to take 10% more damage.

towerUpgrades.name: Chaotic Attack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage on each attack
Affects: Raider

Lv1: 10% to do 20 damage in 200 AoE
Lv2: 20% to do 30 damage in 200 AoE
Lv3: 30% to do 40 damage in 200 AoE
Lv4: 40% to do 50 damage in 200 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Bloodlust
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to increase attack rate
Affects: Orge Magi
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +5% attack rate
Lv2: +10% attack rate
Lv3: +15% attack rate
Lv4: +20% attack rate

spells.name: Bloodlust 1
spells.description:
Increases a friendly unit's attack rate and move speed by 5%.
Lasts 60 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: spell shield ability
Affects: Ogre Magi
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(350 area of effect)

Lv1: blocks 75 spell damage
Lv2: blocks 100 spell damage
Lv3: blocks 125 spell damage
Lv4: blocks 150 spell damage

spells.name: Fel Shield
spells.description: Creates a barrier that stops 75 points of spell damage from affecting a target unit.

towerUpgrades.name: Liquid Fire
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Infernal Contraption and Burrow

Lv1: 5 damage/sec for 2 seconds
Lv2: 10 damage/sec for 3 seconds
Lv3: 15 damage/sec for 4 seconds
Lv4: 20 damage/sec for 5 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Fel Mark
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: summons a Hound upon enemy death
Affects: Warlock
(mark lasts for 60 sec)
(affects non-Hero units)

Lv1: 4 dmg/s, spawns 1 Hound for 20 sec
(has no abilities)
Lv2: 8 dmg/s, spawns 1 Hound for 30 sec
(has 20% block)
Lv3: 12 dmg/s, spawns 1 Hound for 40 sec
(has 60% Spell Resist)
Lv4: 16 dmg/s, spawns 2 Hound for 50 sec

spells.name: Living Flames Potion
spells.description: Infects target enemy unit dealing 4 damage per second for 60 seconds. If the afflicted unit dies while under the effect, a minor minion will spawn from its corpse.

heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Howl of Terror (Disable Spell)
12-30% damage reduction
(affects organic units only)
(45 second cooldown)

(400-700 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(80 second cooldown)

12-30% damage reduction
(doesn't affect Special unit)

100-160 damage/sec for 5s
(50 second cooldown)

skills.name: Howl of Terror - [Level 4]
skills.description: Lets loose a terrifying howl that reduces nearby enemy units' attack damage by 12% for 30 seconds.

skills.name: Battle Cry - [Level 1]
skills.description: Gives friendly nearby units a 12% bonus to damage for 20 seconds.

skills.name: Bladestorm - [Level 1]
skills.description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around the Hero, rendering him immune to magic and dealing 100 damage per second to nearby enemy land units.
Lasts 5 seconds.

heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

(60 second cooldown)

100% chance to avoid an attack 4-10s
(24-30 second cooldown)

20-50% to reduce speed by 50%
(affects organic Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
